control_attributes.control_description: The organization:a. Configures the information system to provide only essential capabilities; andb. Prohibits or restricts the use of the following functions, ports, protocols, and/or services: [Assignment: organization-defined prohibited or restricted functions, ports, protocols, and/or services].

Control Statement: The organization:a. Configures the information system to provide only essential capabilities; andb. Prohibits or restricts the use of the following functions, ports, protocols, and/or services: [Assignment: organization-defined prohibited or restricted functions, ports, protocols, and/or services].
